actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: To eliminate the pay of Members of Congress for any period while any sequestration order for fiscal year 1991 issued under the Balanced Budget and Emergency Deficit Control Act of 1985 is in effect.

summary.text: Prohibits a Member of Congress from receiving pay for any service performed in such Office in any period during which a sequestration order issued for FY 1991 under the Balanced Budget and Emergency Deficit Control Act of 1985 (Gramm-Rudman-Hollings Act) is in effect.

titles.title: To eliminate the pay of Members of Congress for any period while any sequestration order for fiscal year 1991 issued under the Balanced Budget and Emergency Deficit Control Act of 1985 is in effect.
